thread.title: Tim Kendall

author: Tim Kendall
title: Tim Kendall
text:
I'll be honest, I originally searched another brand of mobile tyre fitting in google - I was distracted and clicked the first link, didn't pay attention to brand colours just filled out the tyre size and clicked go. I panicked when I realised I'd just ordered with a company I didn't know.
I was soon relieved when I received clear details of my order, what to expect and simple advice on how to ensure a quick tyre exchange.
The morning of my booking date I received an email with a 2 hour time window along with opportunity to contact if there was an issue with it.
20 minutes before my time slot I was called by Earl and Steve advising they would arrive in 10-15 minutes. It was closer to 10, the van was clean and clearly marked. Earl and Steve were very professional and friendly and even in a busy car park they assured me they would manage without problem.
Within 30 minutes all 4 of my tyres were replaced along with an advisory on my brake discs. Very quick and clean service, beyond my expectations. Thank you. Will use again.
